attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cannabis causes far less damage to the Human body than tobacco, which is openly sold, but is illegal. Legalisation of cannabis will have many positive factors as it will not be cut with dangerous addictive chemicals as it could be closely monitored by the government through licensed growers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
